Projects

Monosyn

A Web Audio synthesiser with Node.js powered modulation controller.

Concierge

A responsive UI component for installing Open Web Apps via the browser.

Visibility.js

A cross-browser plugin for using the Page Visibility API.

Notify.js

A handy wrapper for the Web Notifications API.

Shake.js

A custom “shake” event plugin for mobile web browsers using device accelerometer.

Tap.js

A custom “tap” event JavaScript plugin for mobile and tablet browsers.

Wave-PD1

A touch-friendly audio synthesizer, built using the Web Audio API. Also available in the Chrome Web Store.

Checklist

A mobile web app for creating quick to-do lists. Also available on Firefox Marketplace.
